name: Track Watch List
description:
Manage your personal watch list for movies and TV shows. Add, remove, and view movies you want to watch.

You can:
- Add movies to your watch list
- Remove movies from your watch list
- View your complete watch list
- Check watch list status for movies
- Organize and manage entertainment queue

Stores watch list in the database.

** WHEN TO USE **
- User asks to "add to watch list" or "add to favorites"
- User wants to see their watch list
- User wants to manage saved movies
- User wants to remove from watch list

** WHEN NOT TO USE **
- User wants to search for movies (use search_movies)
- User wants movie details (use get_movie_details)
- User wants recommendations (use get_entertainment_recommendations)

** EXAMPLES **

1. Add movie to watch list:
{
  "action": "add",
  "content_id": "278",
  "content_type": "movie",
  "title": "The Shawshank Redemption"
}

2. View watch list:
{
  "action": "list"
}

3. Remove from watch list:
{
  "action": "remove",
  "content_id": "278",
  "content_type": "movie"
}

action.description: Action to perform on watch list

content_id.description: Movie or show ID (required for add, remove, check actions)

content_type.description: Type of content (movie or tv show)
